Articles.Content: I have an asteroid base built into an E class with 2922 tons of "resources". I just accepted a contract to expand that station, and on of the requirements is to have 5000 units of ore on the station, meaning I'll have to mine my asteroid. Is there a known ratio of units of ore to resources available? I'm hoping I won't have to ship ore to my station.

It literally has 2922 ton of ore in that asteroid. As ore's density is 10kg/unit, you would spend 50ton of it.

By the way, you can fill ore tank in VAB
(Like when launch a empty fuel tank) and dock it.
